column4: Hey all, i have just downloaded the JVm of of their website and tried to install it using instructions i got from a forum. The problem is that it doesn't work. HEre is what i typed in the terminal in accordance to what they told me to do.   root@Mavers-network:/home/darkness # alien -d jre-1_5_0_05-linux-i586-1.bin
Could anyone help me with this?
my guess is you missed a step..
i can't see how i stuffed it up.
I did exactly what it told me to do on the site. I typed it in word for word, but i had to change the file name because it was different to the one in the tutorial thing.
Did you install the Blackdown installer? or Sun Java JRE 5.0
There were 2 sets of instructions on that site. Which one did you follow?
Also did you sudo update-alternatives --config java
It should give you a menu and ask for a number
you want to choose the one for sun jre
blame sun and their restrictive licensing
They won't let anyone distribute java but them
